laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Gel electrophoresis for SHOX mutation analysis
laboratory_examinations.findings: No mutations were detected by single-strand conformational polymorphism analysis of the PCR-amplified SHOX.
Bone age was 12 years, in agreement with pubertal status.
Low spontaneous GH secretion of 1.6 ng/mL (B) and 2.7 ng/mL (G) with maximum peaks 4.3 ng/mL (B) and 9.2 ng/mL (G).
GH peak serum levels of 5.3 ng/mL in the boy and 10.0 ng/mL in the girl.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Serum analysis for IGF-I and IGFBP-3
laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal IGF-I and IGFBP-3 serum levels in both children: 62 ng/mL and 2713 ng/mL (B) and 110 ng/mL and 2449 ng/mL (G).
Height increased from -3.5 SD to -2.5 SD (G) and from -2.5 SD to -1.6 SD (B) over 12 months.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Height velocity increased from -2.3 SD to -1.9 SD (9.5 cm/yr) (G) and from -2.0 SD to -1.4 SD (9.4 cm/yr) (B).
